methods.name: public static AdBuffer dupAdBuffer(AdBuffer buffer) throws IOException
public int getId()
methods.comment:
* Gets corresponding AD request ID.
     *
     * @return The ID of the ad request

methods.name: public String getMimeType()
methods.comment:
* Gets the mime type of the data.
     *
     * @return The mime type of the data.

methods.name: public SharedMemory getSharedMemory()
methods.comment:
* Gets the {@link SharedMemory} which stores the data. * *

Information on how the data in this buffer is formatted can be found using * {@link AdRequest#getMetadata()} *

This data lives in a {@link SharedMemory} instance because of the * potentially large amount of data needed to store the ad. This optimizes the * data communication between the ad data source and the service responsible for * its display. * * @see SharedMemory#create(String, int) * @return The {@link SharedMemory} that stores the data for this ad buffer.

methods.name: public int getOffset()
methods.comment:
* Gets the offset into the shared memory to begin mapping.
     *
     * @see SharedMemory#map(int, int, int)
     * @return The offset of this ad buffer in the shared memory in bytes.

methods.name: public int getLength()
methods.comment:
* Gets the data length of this ad buffer.
     *
     * @return The data length of this ad buffer in bytes.

methods.name: public long getPresentationTimeUs()
methods.comment:
* Gets the presentation time.
     *
     * @return The presentation time in microseconds.

methods.name: public int getFlags()
methods.comment:
* Gets the buffer flags for this ad buffer.
     *
     * @see android.media.MediaCodec
     * @return The buffer flags for this ad buffer.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull android.os.Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public static AdBuffer dupAdBuffer(AdBuffer buffer) throws IOException
public void writeToParcel(@NonNull android.os.Parcel dest, int flags)
